title: Control Flight
data:
{{obsolete}}
'''Control Flight''' is an [[intrinsic]] that causes sources of [[levitation]] to instead let you [[fly]]. This allows you to grab items off the ground or to descend [[stairs]] and exits (such as from [[the Abyss]]) without landing first. 

All [[draconian]]s have Control Flight innately. [[Tengu]] receive it while using their unique flight [[ability]], but not when using other sources of levitation. Other characters can acquire it by wearing the [[unrandart]] [[Amulet of the Air]] or by casting [[Flight (spell)|Flight]].

==History==
*In [[0.12]], this intrinsic was completely removed along with [[levitation]].
*Prior to [[0.11]], it was also available through the [[amulet of controlled flight]].
